excerpt: "SINTRONES, one of the global leaders in computing technology in vehicles, announces the launch of the new EBOX-7000 Edge AI GPU Computing. The new EBOX-7000 Edge AI GPU Computing is suitable for various factory automation and Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) control system in large-scale processes such as mining and manufacturing."
